properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
12 METER S/V ALICE REPORTS PERSON WITH
SERIOUS INFECTION REQUIRING MEDICAL
ASSISTANCE IN 47-50.00N 017-06.00W AT 032113Z JUL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY ABLE TO PROVIDE MEDICAL
ASSISTANCE REQUESTED TO ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
PHONE: 4434 4382 0028, 44 344 382 0025,
FAX: 4413 2924 4547,
E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK
